name: rizq-ios
description: Native iOS development toolkit for RIZQ App - React to SwiftUI translation, TCA architecture, Firebase integration, XcodeGen project generation, testing infrastructure, and App Store deployment
author: RIZQ App Team

agents.name: ios-architect
agents.description: Design iOS app architecture using The Composable Architecture (TCA). Use for project setup, module structure, navigation, and dependency injection.

agents.name: component-translator
agents.description: Translate React/TypeScript components to SwiftUI views. Handles props to bindings, hooks to observable state, and Tailwind to SwiftUI modifiers.

agents.name: view-builder
agents.description: Build native SwiftUI views following RIZQ design system - warm Islamic aesthetic, Arabic text rendering, custom modifiers, accessibility.

agents.name: feature-builder
agents.description: Create TCA Feature modules with Reducer, Action, State, and Effect. Handles async operations, dependencies, and testing scaffolds.

agents.name: networking-architect
agents.description: Design networking layer for Neon PostgreSQL API access. URLSession with async/await, Codable models, error handling, caching.

agents.name: auth-architect
agents.description: Implement authentication with Firebase Auth (recommended) or Better Auth/Neon Auth. Handles OAuth providers, Keychain storage, and session management.

agents.name: animation-translator
agents.description: Convert Framer Motion animations to SwiftUI - staggered lists, spring physics, gesture animations, celebration particles.

agents.name: persistence-architect
agents.description: Design local data persistence using SwiftData for structured data, UserDefaults for preferences, and migration strategies.

agents.name: native-integrator
agents.description: Integrate iOS native features: haptic feedback, WidgetKit, ShareSheet, App Intents (Siri), push notifications.

agents.name: ci-cd-architect
agents.description: Configure fastlane for CI/CD, code signing with match, TestFlight distribution, and App Store submission.

agents.name: debugger
agents.description: Debug iOS issues: Instruments profiling, memory leaks, SwiftUI preview problems, TCA action tracing.

agents.name: testflight-preparer
agents.description: Prepare iOS builds for TestFlight - validate requirements, icons, Info.plist, privacy manifests, export compliance.

agents.name: testflight-submitter
agents.description: Build, archive, and upload iOS apps to TestFlight using fastlane or xcodebuild.

agents.name: testflight-manager
agents.description: Manage TestFlight testers, groups, build distribution, feedback collection, and build lifecycle.

agents.name: test-architect
agents.description: Design and implement iOS test infrastructure using TCA TestStore for unit tests and swift-snapshot-testing for visual regression tests.

agents.name: firebase-integrator
agents.description: Integrate Firebase services (Auth, Firestore) into iOS apps. Use for Firebase setup, authentication flows, Firestore data modeling, and security rules.

skills.name: swiftui-patterns
skills.description: SwiftUI patterns equivalent to React: view composition, state management, environment, property wrappers

skills.name: tca-patterns
skills.description: The Composable Architecture patterns: Reducer, Effect, Dependency, Store composition, testing

skills.name: design-system-ios
skills.description: RIZQ design system translated to SwiftUI: Color extensions, Typography, Spacing, Shadows, ViewModifiers

skills.name: animation-mapping
skills.description: Framer Motion to SwiftUI animation translation guide with code examples

skills.name: networking-patterns
skills.description: URLSession async/await patterns, Neon API integration, Codable, error handling

skills.name: auth-patterns-ios
skills.description: Authentication patterns for iOS: Firebase Auth (recommended), OAuth flow, Keychain storage, token refresh

skills.name: persistence-patterns
skills.description: SwiftData models, UserDefaults wrappers, @AppStorage, migration strategies

skills.name: native-apis
skills.description: iOS native API patterns: UIFeedbackGenerator, WidgetKit, ShareSheet, App Intents

skills.name: fastlane-guide
skills.description: fastlane lanes, match for code signing, deliver for App Store, pilot for TestFlight

skills.name: testflight-guide
skills.description: Complete TestFlight guide: requirements, preparation, submission, tester management, Beta App Review, troubleshooting

skills.name: xcodegen-guide
skills.description: XcodeGen project.yml schema, target configuration, SPM dependencies, schemes, and CI/CD integration

skills.name: testing-patterns
skills.description: iOS testing patterns with TCA TestStore, swift-snapshot-testing, mock factories, and CI configuration

skills.name: firestore-patterns
skills.description: Firestore data modeling, query patterns, transactions, real-time listeners, and security rules for iOS apps

commands.name: init-project
commands.description: Initialize new iOS project using XcodeGen with TCA, SwiftUI, SwiftData, and complete RIZQ design system

commands.name: translate-component
commands.description: Translate a React component to SwiftUI view

commands.name: translate-page
commands.description: Translate entire React page to SwiftUI screen with TCA Feature

commands.name: generate-feature
commands.description: Generate new TCA Feature module from scratch

commands.name: generate-view
commands.description: Generate new SwiftUI view following design system

commands.name: sync-design-tokens
commands.description: Synchronize design tokens from Tailwind config to Swift

commands.name: setup-fastlane
commands.description: Initialize fastlane with match, deliver, and pilot

commands.name: build-archive
commands.description: Build and archive app for distribution

commands.name: prepare-testflight
commands.description: Validate iOS project readiness for TestFlight - check icons, Info.plist, privacy, signing

commands.name: submit-testflight
commands.description: Build, archive, and upload to TestFlight with optional distribution

commands.name: generate-tests
commands.description: Generate unit tests and snapshot tests for an iOS feature

commands.name: run-tests
commands.description: Execute iOS tests with optional coverage reporting

commands.name: setup-snapshots
commands.description: Configure snapshot testing infrastructure with swift-snapshot-testing

commands.name: setup-firebase
commands.description: Configure Firebase Auth and Firestore for the iOS app, verify setup, and optionally configure emulator
